message: I'm excited to offer you this great product for a competitive price. I think you'll really love it!
I appreciate your offer, but $180 is a bit higher than I was hoping to spend.  How about $140? I'm really interested in this product, but need to stay within my budget.
I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $160, which is a great deal considering the value this product offers.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $160 is still a bit out of my range.  How about $155?  It's a fair price for both of us and allows me to stay within my budget.

I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to ensure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I can do $165, which is still a good deal considering the value it offers. If you're really interested, this is my final offer.
